meanings.definition: The act of promoting or being promoted.
meanings.sent1: Her promotion to manager made her very happy.
meanings.sent2: The promotion of the new movie attracted a large audience.
meanings.sent3: The promotion of the cake sale brought in more customers than expected.
meanings.sent4: His promotion to team captain elevated his status among his peers.
meanings.sent5: The promotion of the concert was so well done that tickets sold out in a day.

meanings.definition: An advancement in rank or position.
meanings.sent1: After his promotion to vice president, he had more responsibilities.
meanings.sent2: The promotion to senior editor was a significant achievement for her.
meanings.sent3: The promotion to head chef meant he could finally showcase his culinary skills.
meanings.sent4: Her promotion to lead dancer put her in the spotlight.
meanings.sent5: The promotion to team leader came with a pay raise and a corner office.

meanings.definition: Advertising or publicizing a product or event.
meanings.sent1: The promotion of the new smartphone highlighted its advanced features.
meanings.sent2: Online promotion of the event reached a wide audience.
meanings.sent3: The promotion of the charity event on social media boosted attendance.
meanings.sent4: The promotion of the fashion brand created a buzz in the industry.
meanings.sent5: Effective promotion of the product led to a spike in sales.
